tool_description: Convert your images to text using  this API that returns a json object with the extracted text in a string format. Perfect for images, books with typed text. Please input a clean image without noise for the best results.
name: Simple OCR Image to Text
title: Simple OCR Image to Text

api_list.name: Get the text from base64 input
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return the text once you give a json with your base64 string as well as the text from image

To see only the text use **response["ocrString"]**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-ocr-image-to-text.p.rapidapi.com/post"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-ocr-image-to-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-ocr-image-to-text.p.rapidapi.com/post"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-ocr-image-to-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
